attributes.review: this app smelled like absolute ✨cheetos✨ it was ✨DISGUSTING✨ if you see this☺️✨🌸🧚💕 leave a one star💕☺️🧚🌸✨ anyways...hope the person reading this has a good day☺️unless youre actually downloading this app because you support trump☺️😠🤢🤮
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY GARBAGE NO INFORMATION AT ALL

attributes.review: absolutely awful!! app glitches wayyy too much, and whenever i load up the app, it immediately freezes. nothing i do works, the only thing i can do is delete it and try again. if if it doesnt freeze on me (which is rare) like i said, everything is very glitchy, laggy, and slow. unbelievable!!
attributes.title: horrible, horrible app

attributes.review: Don’t get this app 😳 once I downloaded it my mind was corrupt by all its fake news ❌. It tricked me into believing that a Cheeto was the president 🤮. Thank god I deleted it and I’m back to reality 💅. Our president is just really Orange 🍊 and an idiot 🧚 my bad.
attributes.title: Omg terrible!!

attributes.review: This app is horrible when I first opened the app it asked me if I wanted notifications instead of asking how my day was?!! Learn some manner!  🚫 vote from me❗️
attributes.title: Notifications!!?!

attributes.review: i signed up and this app kept making my phone crash this app is garbage don’t waste your time on getting it unless if you want your phone to crash
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!

attributes.review: Don’t listen to all the five star reviews, they are all spam.  The app doesn’t work correctly, it shuts down all the time.  The app acts for too much private information.
attributes.title: REAL REVIEW

attributes.review:
I downloaded the app hoping for the best and now scammers sent everyone this “••••• •••• •••(my address) she likes trump” I don’t even like him I was curious
The app always lefts a bug on my phone
attributes.title: REAL REVIEW !! It leaked my address

attributes.review: I wanted to gain more insight to Trump’s campaign, but as soon as I dowloaded it my uterus was almost ripped out of my body since I didn’t have a husband to cook for.
attributes.title: This app tried to rip my uterus out of my body

attributes.review: I was all for Trump until I learned that he and the Republican National Committee are running a child sex trafficking ring out of the basements of the Trump hotels worldwide. It’s true,  I read it on Q-Anon! Or some similarly reliable news source.
attributes.title: Stop RNC CHILD SEX RING

attributes.review: Downloaded the app to see our president in action but all i got was bunker boy hiding in his hole mumbling about some guy named Epstein and not having enough self tanner? 0/10 would recommend
attributes.title: Not a good app
